titleInfo.title: Portrait of Tillye Shulman (Levy) at Age Two

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 7 x 5 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On envelope: ''#87 Tillye Levy, 2, Central City 1897''. On note inside envelope: ''Tillye Shulman (Levy) aged 2 Central City, 1897 Donor Mrs. Tillye Levy''.

mods.abstract: Tillye Shulman Levy, shown here at age two at the Shulman family home in Central City in 1897, became one of Denver's most active Jewish volunteers in the area of social welfare.
mods.note: Appears in ''Images of America: Jewish Denver 1859-1940,'' by Dr. Jeanne Abrams, on page 89.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
